statements: SELECT * FROM solar_power_storage_systems;
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM solar_power_storage_systems ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, efficiency FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE storage_capacity > 500 ORDER BY efficiency ASC;
SELECT system_id, system_name, installation_date FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE storage_capacity < 3000;
SELECT system_name, efficiency FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE storage_capacity > 500 ORDER BY efficiency DESC
SELECT system_id, installation_date FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY installation_date ASC
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY system_name
SELECT * FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency < 0.5 AND storage_capacity BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY system_id DESC
SELECT installation_date, system_name FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE storage_capacity > 300 AND efficiency > 0.6 ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM solar_power_storage_systems;
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity FROM solar_power_storage_systems ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT system_name, efficiency_rating FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT system_id, system_name, installation_date FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM efficiency_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE storage_capacity > 5000
SELECT system_name, efficiency_rating FROM solar_power_storage_systems ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity, installation_date FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity, efficiency_rating FROM solar_power_storage_systems WHERE installation_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY storage_capacity ASC
SELECT sp.system_id, sp.system_name, er.efficiency_percent FROM solar_power_storage_systems sp LEFT JOIN efficiency_records er ON sp.system_id = er.system_id
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerSystems;
SELECT id, system_name, efficiency FROM SolarPowerSystems ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity FROM SolarPowerSystems WHERE storage_capacity > 1000;
SELECT id, generation_date, power_generated FROM PowerGeneration WHERE power_generated > 500;
SELECT system_id, SUM(power_used) AS total_power_used FROM PowerUsage GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerSystems WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY system_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT system_name, storage_capacity FROM SolarPowerSystems WHERE storage_capacity >= 1000;

SELECT system_name, generation_date, power_generated FROM SolarPowerSystems JOIN PowerGeneration ON SolarPowerSystems.id = PowerGeneration.system_id WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT system_name, usage_date, power_used FROM SolarPowerSystems JOIN PowerUsage ON SolarPowerSystems.id = PowerUsage.system_id WHERE power_used > 500 ORDER BY power_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPowerSystems WHERE efficiency < 0.7 AND storage_capacity < 2000;
SELECT system_id, system_name, efficiency, storage_capacity FROM solar_power_systems;
SELECT * FROM power_measurements WHERE measurement_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, log_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, latitude, longitude FROM system_location WHERE system_id = 3;
SELECT system_id, AVG(power_generated) AS avg_power_generated FROM power_measurements GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT system_name, efficiency FROM solar_power_systems WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY efficiency DESC

SELECT system_name, power_generated FROM solar_power_systems JOIN power_measurements ON solar_power_systems.system_id = power_measurements.system_id WHERE power_generated > 100 ORDER BY power_generated DESC

SELECT system_name, log_date, maintenance_type FROM solar_power_systems JOIN maintenance_logs ON solar_power_systems.system_id = maintenance_logs.system_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'inspection' ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT system_name, latitude, longitude FROM solar_power_systems JOIN system_location ON solar_power_systems.system_id = system_location.system_id WHERE latitude < 40

SELECT system_name, power_generated, power_consumed FROM solar_power_systems JOIN power_measurements ON solar_power_systems.system_id = power_measurements.system_id WHERE power_generated != power_consumed ORDER BY system_name
SELECT * FROM solar_power_system;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM solar_power_system;
SELECT system_id, efficiency FROM solar_power_system ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM solar_power_system WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM solar_power_system WHERE efficiency >= 0.75 LIMIT 5
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM energy_production WHERE production_amount < 200 ORDER BY production_date ASC
SELECT system_id, report_month, energy_savings FROM monthly_report WHERE energy_savings BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT system_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE 'Electrical%'
